features: 【RGB LED lights】KAFRI RBG Headphone Stand can display 9 lighting effects modes, up to 16.8 million colors to creat an amazing gaming atmosphere at your preference. that can be selected merely by pressing a Touch switch. Great gifts for Son, boy, Men, husband and boyfriend.

【10W Qi Wireless Charger】Say goodbye to tangled wires and messing cables, just place your phone on fast charger pad. no cables or USB interface required. Charger compatible with Apple iPhone XS Max,XR,XS, X, iPhone 8/8 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S9/S9 Plus, Note 8, S8/S8 Plus, and other Qi-enabled cell phones.(Metal attachments or credit cards will interfere with charging.)

【Intelligently Identify Charge Models】 Fast wireless charge up to 10W compatible with Samsung Galaxy S10,S10 Plus, S10E, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8 Plus, Note 9, Note 8, S7, S7 edge, S6 edge+, 7.5W qi wireless charging for iPhone 11/11 Pro Max X/ XS/ XS Max/ XR/ 8/ 8 Plus ( Note: QC2.0/3.0 adapter needed for fast charge) and 5W standard wireless charge for All Qi-enabled phones.

【Safe Guard】Fire-resistant and hardened plastic outer shell for durability, no risk of wood flammable and metal leakage,build-in premium circuitry and microchip, ensure device safety.Multi-protection system shields everything from overload, short-circuits, over-current and other charging issues.

【What You Get】KAFRI Headphone dock / Wireless Charging Pad, 5ft / 1.5m USB Cord , If there is any quality issue for this headphone rack or you are not happy with your purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Sleek and Multifunctional Gaming Headset Holder!
reviews.reviewText: The KAFRI RGB Headphone Stand with Wireless Charger has exceeded my expectations in every aspect, offering a sleek and multifunctional solution for organizing and charging my gaming headset. This stylish headset holder is a perfect addition to my gaming setup, combining functionality and aesthetics flawlessly.First and foremost, the built-in wireless charger is a game-changer. The 10W/7.5W fast charging capability ensures my compatible devices are charged quickly and conveniently, eliminating the need for messy cables and providing a clutter-free gaming environment.The RGB lighting feature adds a touch of excitement to my gaming station. The customizable LED lighting allows me to set the mood and match my gaming setup's aesthetics, enhancing the overall gaming experience.The sturdy and reliable construction of the headphone stand ensures it securely holds my gaming headset without any risk of slipping or falling. The padded surface provides gentle support for my headphones, keeping them in top-notch condition.The additional USB ports on the stand are a thoughtful addition, allowing me to charge other devices or connect peripherals easily, providing added convenience during gaming sessions.Moreover, the headphone stand's design is space-saving and well-organized, keeping my desk neat and tidy. It also serves as an attractive display piece when not in use, adding a touch of sophistication to my gaming setup.Installation was hassle-free, requiring no additional tools or complicated setup. The stand is ready to use out of the box, making it a user-friendly and practical accessory.The stand is not only suitable for gaming headsets but also versatile for other headphones, making it a valuable addition to any desk setup, home office, or gaming station.Cleaning and maintenance are easy, as the surface can be wiped clean to keep the stand looking pristine and vibrant.In conclusion, the stand is a must-have accessory for gamers seeking an elegant and functional headset holder. Its wireless charging capability, customizable RGB lighting, and user-friendly design make it a standout choice for organizing and charging gaming headsets. If you want to elevate your gaming setup with a sleek and multifunctional headphone stand, I highly recommend the stand. It's a fantastic investment that combines both practicality and aesthetics for an immersive and organized gaming experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gamer's Delight with Wireless Charging
reviews.reviewText: The KAFRI RGB Headphone Stand with Wireless Charger is a gamer's dream come true. This sleek and futuristic stand not only keeps your gaming headset organized and easily accessible but also adds a vibrant touch with customizable RGB lighting. The built-in wireless charger is a game-changer, providing a convenient solution to keep your devices powered up while you play. The stand is sturdy, and the design is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. While the wireless charging feature is a standout, it would be even more versatile if it accommodated a wider range of devices. Nevertheless, for gamers seeking a stylish and efficient headphone stand with the added bonus of wireless charging, the KAFRI RGB Headphone Stand is a fantastic choice deserving of a solid 5-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product has one downfall
reviews.reviewText: Ive been using it for about 2 weeks now and the lighting is perfect not too bright not too low its perfect it hold my headset nice doesnt fall iver easy or shake around the only thing i have to complain about it is the wireless charger is really slow unless ur playing for hours and just leave it there but if u do like a 30min- 1 hour session of gaming ur only gonna see about 10-15 + battery percentage and its kinda in a weird spot kinda hard to figure out where to line it up at sometiems ill put it on there and it wont charge so i have to adjust my phone around to find the spot but all in all its a great product besides that one little thing which was the main reason i bought it lol because of the double functionality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for Christmas and they loved it. Works great and is just as pictured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stand for the price. Would recommend.
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely recommend this headset stand. Stand was very easy to assemble and set up. The stand feels very solid, and definitely feels very premium for the price. I haven't tested out the wireless charging, and probably won't ever use it. I already own several wireless chargers, and my main reason of getting this stand was just for the lighting. The rgb lighting looks fantastic btw. It's the perfect amount of brightness in my opinion. You can have all the colors, or select a color specific(up to 5 I think). I have 2 headsets that are identical, but work on 2 different consoles. So this saves me the headache of trying to figure out which headset is for what. Stand comes with a USB cord, and can be plugged into a brick or surge protector with USB ports. The price and functionality of this stand was perfect for my needs. My camera kept wanting to make the lights look insanely bright, so I adjusted the settings on my camera to as close to the actual brightness as I could get it. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's okay, but it feel very cheap and isn't weighted at the base
reviews.reviewText: Not saying you should not buy this just temper your expectations. It is very very very plasticky and there is little to no extra weight in the base to stabilize it. All headphones stands that support two headphones should also have two USB ports for the headphones to charge on. It also should not spark when you plug it in.
Works great! And looks nice also phone charger works well

reviews.reviewerName: Brenda Grisel Doniz PadillaBrenda Grisel Doniz Padilla
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Me gustó, las luces lucen mucho, cumple su propósito, el cargador funciona muy bien. Solo no tiene puertos usb adicionales así que consume un puerto del equipo. Se solución teniendo un hub usb.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple, Sleek and works as intended
reviews.reviewText: Would definitely recommend, Wirelessly charging works and the headset stand works as intended. 10/10 recommended for this pricing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid product! Great look and quality.
reviews.reviewText: Initially ordered the unit without the wireless charging, then exchanged for the unit with the wireless charging. A great fit on my music production desk, the stand lighting option adds some cool effects to my studio setting, and the wireless charger makes it a great landing spot for my iPhone. Great design and great for my Bose headphones and cables. Sleek look and design, great lighting effects, and great built in wireless charging. Highly recommend!
